events.title: WECE Exec Board Applications
events.description: Apply to be a part of our executive board for 2021-2022! We are looking for a president, 2 external vice presidents, internal vice president, treasurer, and secretary! Experience on WECE board or recommendation from the current board is recommended.

events.title: WECE Board Applications
events.description: Join the WECE board and head one of our committees! Our director positions are for Academic, Infrastructure, Marketing, Mentorship, Outreach, Social, and Technical.

events.title: Web Dev Team Meeting
events.description: Join the WECE Web Dev Team meeting to see everyone's progress on the blog project!

events.title: WECE April General Meeting
events.description: Join us for our April GM for our event announcements and exciting news about the end of the year for WECE!

events.title: Spotify Data Investigation with Python
events.description: Curious about how spotify wrapped makes its conclusions? Want to delve deeper into your music history? Or just want to delve deeper into python and turning large data files into meaningful conclusions? Join us for the Spotify Data Investigation workshop! If you want to learn about your own spotify listening history, we recommend you request your data through settings in advance, as it can take up to 30 days for spotify to send you the data. Don't worry, we will have sample datasets during the workshop so if you do not use spotify or your data hasn't been sent yet you can still learn, and just use the programs we develop on your data later!

events.title: WECE Week
events.description:
Monday (Mentorship) April 26th:
Lean-in: Reflecting on a Unique Year @11am-12pm CST

Virtual escape room @6-7pm CST

Tuesday (Technical) April 27th:
Introduction to Hackathons Workshop @5-6pm CST

Wednesday (Academic) April 28th:
ECE Advising Presentation & Q/A @5-6PM CST

Thursday (Marketing) April 29th:
Fun presentation! @6-7 PM CST

Friday (Social) April 30th:
WECE Spring Family Feud @4-5pm CST

Saturday (Infrastructure) May 1st:
Hackathon @9am-9pm CST

other_announcements.title: Resume Book
other_announcements.description: Looking for internships or full-time jobs? Add your resume to our WECE Resume database that we send to all our sponsors. Add it on this Google Form!

other_announcements.title: Alumni Database
other_announcements.description: If you are an alumni, we would love to stay in contact with you! If you would like to help WECE with professional development and help our current members, please fill out this form!

other_announcements.title: Join our WECE Slack Workspace
other_announcements.description: WECE uses Slack as a way to streamline communication between WECE members and committees, as well as a place for important announcements and upcoming events! Join our general channel here.
